title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.8 - Animals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.8 - Animals

State Regulations

No person shall enter upon any transportation facility with
any animal except a Seeing Eye dog, which shall be under control at all times, or an animal properly confined for shipment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1151.8

Amended, New

York State Register May 14, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 19, eff. 5/14/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
